articles.title: Covid-19: Use oxygen judiciously, promote pronal breathing, says medical expert - India Today
articles.description: As many Covid-19 patients gasp for breath, senior doctors and medical experts have recommended judicious use of oxygen and pronal breathing (lying on stomach) for patients with mild to moderate symptoms.
articles.content:
As oxygen shortages have sent the Covid-stricken country into a tizzy, medical experts are calling on their colleagues to use the life-saving gas judiciously.
In the last few days, several hospitals… [+4213 chars]
